page.topic: Detail View - Image Capture using Camera/HTML5 - Disconnected Applications
page.description: You can build mobile, disconnected applications, that include the ability to capture images using the camera on the device. When running on a device that does not have a camera, the image to use can be selected from the file system.

section.description: To create a button to capture a new image for an Image control in a List Detail View use the 'Image Capture for List-Detail View - Camera/Photo Library' action.
For more information on capturing images in the List Detail View, see Creating Disconnected Mobile Applications and search for 'camera'.
